headline: Halliburton Appoints Timothy A. Leach to Board of Directors
summary: HOUSTON, December 02, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) announced the appointment of Mr. Timothy A. Leach to its board of directors. The appointment is effective Dec. 2, 2025, and Mr. Leach will stand for election by shareholders at Halliburton’s 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
